name: Pott Skillgrim vs The Earth
description:
POTT SKILLGRIM vs THE EARTH Description:

It's your girlfriend's birthday, and there's nothing better than celebrating with friends, cake, and a kidnapping..? Set out in this hectic 2D platforming adventure to rescue your girlfriend back from her crazy ninja ex-boyfriend. Equipped with sick jumps and throwable potatoes, navigate your way through cityscapes, train tunnels, sewers and evil labs in pursuit of the greatest birthday gift ever, a swift rescue.
